content.rendered:
beauty bar in hillcrest mall | THE TEN SPOT®

welcome to 10spot® beauty bar in hillcrest mall, richmond hill. our team is full of skilled experts who know how to make you look and feel your best! we offer a variety of services like waxing, facials, nail care, and laser hair removal. when you visit us, our awesome team will set you on track to taking the steps to feeling #LikeATen®

book now!
gift certificates
buy a series
buy a membership
newsletter sign-up
beauty bar in hillcrest mall | THE TEN SPOT®
  • 9350 yonge st unit bo22c hillcrest mall, richmond hill, ontario
  • 905-770-5454
  • hillcrestmall@thetenspot.com

Hours

mon. - sat: 10:00 am – 8:00 pm

sun.: 11:00 am – 7:00 pm

our beauty bar services

nails

we offer the best mani pedi in town! we offer nail extensions, gel nails, pedicures, and many more.

See services menu

waxing

we offer top notch waxing services designed to make you #feellikeaten like our brazilly®, thongkini®, general full body waxing, and much more.

See services menu

facials

our team has serious skills when it comes to facial treatments. we offer stress-free facial procedures like anti-aging facials, dermaplaning, chemical peels, and many more.

See services menu

brows

what better way to spoil yourself than by getting your brows and lashes done. wether you’re looking for lash lifts, brow lams, or more, we do it all.

See services menu

laser

hair removal can be tricky, thats why we make it simple with our awesome lineup of laser hair removal treatments like our bikini laser, full body laser, and much more.

See services menu
book now at this location

Check out our awesome reviews!

First time visit this Ten spot location! Had Jordyn for my pedicure. She did such an amazing job, so thorough. Super friendly & sweet! Would recommend everyone to go to her 🙂
heidi chen
1722038071
I had a fantastic experience at The Ten Spot Richmond Hill! I've been there several times for manicures, pedicures, and nail extensions (**They lasted a month!!**)Service is wonderful, the environment is kept to the utmost cleanliness!!! Absolutely would recommend treatments done by them!
Emily Fung
1721958636
Excellent customer service. I was late and they made me feel welcomed. I apologized and they offered me coffee, tea. They cared for my 5 yr old daughter like she was the only person in the room. Jordan, Kesa, Asana thank you. You made my first experience a success. Sorry if I spelled your names incorrectly.
Donna Tracey
1720728207
Amazing service! Hasti is a great nail . Sad to hear she is leaving. Hannah who greeted me and was so friendly and bubbly! Definitely 5 stars… would give more if I could! Will definitely be back!
Brunella Kolbegger
1710196832
had an amazing experience getting my nails done here. victoria did an amazing job and she was super knowledgeable! jordyn was also super helpful even though she wasn’t doing my nails, she still made my experience great! mayan, the receptionist, was extremely welcoming and warm. she offered me something to drink as soon as i walked in and had great conversations with me while i got my nails done. highly recommend this location, extremely sanitary and the staff are amazing!!
Shanny Keilikhis
1710001524
I recently visited Ten Spot and had a fantastic experience that I would like to share with you. From the moment I walked in, the ambiance was inviting and relaxing, setting the tone for a wonderful pampering session. The nail technicians were skilled and meticulous, creating a beautiful job that exceeded my expectations. I left the salon with nails that looked absolutely stunning. Overall, I highly recommend this nail salon for anyone looking for a top-notch experience and excellent service!
Fernanda B
1709137065
I have been going to this location for about 2 years now, on a biweekly basis. I will say that when I first started going I wasn’t super impressed as I had been going to the don mills location for years before that. But I kept going and it was clear that most of the issues were just bad management. Trisha, Janet and Delan were always so wonderful. They always made sure I left with great nails. When new management took over a few months ago I noticed changes right away and have been very happy here. I still get my shellac mani every two weeks and look forward it! I love the ten spot and don’t mind spending a bit extra to have a clean and friendly service here. The attention to detail is always there and I love getting a coffee with my service. I do recommend them to anyone looking for a new place to go get their nails done.
Lauren Sharp
1707886655
Book with Taryn!! It was my first time ever at the ten spot today. Got a full face wax. She really took her time and make sure my face is hairless (hahaha)! She was also communicative before proceeding with the waxing which I really appreciate. 10/10 would recommend, can’t wait to come back! 🙂
Patty Lin
1707168700
My daughter enjoyed very much celebrating her birthday with her friends at the spa. The place is clean and the staff is super friendly and welcoming. We will be back for sure to try other services. Thank you!
Simona S.
1702252413
This was my first time going for a laser treatment and it was such a smooth experience! Staff at The Hillcrest Mall location were super friendly and made the experience comfortable. The place is really clean and the girls are knowledgeable. It’s under new management which shows in the overall experience of my visit! Can’t wait to finish my treatment here!
Davika Singh
1701112663
I’ve been to this location 2 times for gel mani and pedi and I’m very happy to have found this salon and have met Janet! I’ve not tried all services yet but my experience so far has been beyond my expectations. This is most probably because of the owner herself being quite responsible, kind and caring and her high level skills at client relations as well as Janet being an absolute professional doing her best during your visit. They’re very friendly and gentle and your visit turns to home comfort. Both my nails and feet needed a lot of work but Janet did a great job! Willing to try facials w/Janet in the shortest run. Confidently recommended!
Serpil Turker
1696438900
Update: I have being going to this location since last summer. Just love it. I go every three weeks for shellac removal and mani. Also go for pedicures every couple if months. Also went on vacation end of January and got waxing on legs bikini and eye brows. Next to painless in bikini area. Least painful waxing in that area I’ve ever had. Highly recommend Janet and all services.Have been twice now for shellac manicure. Janet did a wonderful job. Loved the colours each time. No chipping. Janet is very friendly and good at what she does. Will be back for my next removal and polish. I also had a pedicure done by Treshia a couple of weeks ago. Loved the colour. My feet needed a lot of work. Calluses and hard nails. Treshia did a wonderful job. My feet were in much better shape when I left. Will be back for more.
Linda Strother
1689342078
A friend of mine recommended this place so I booked an appointment for a pedicure to test it out. I’m very specific about the salons I choose to go to, but this one had really great service and made me feel relaxed throughout the whole process. I didn’t have to worry about anything, I felt very comfortable!! Only downside is that after I left , my nails smudged. I guess it wasn’t as dry as seemed…I was really upset about this, so when I called to book an appointment, they were really reassuring & when I came, they quickly fixed it with no questions asked, no complaints. I barely ever come out of a salon with a smudged nail, but this goes to show how great their customer support is!! Also the ladies are lovely!
Myriam Kazin
1687367579
First time at this spa and overall am very happy with my experience. One of my favourite spa experiences to date. The spa is very clean, the service was wonderful and I’m very happy with my shellac manicure and pedicure. It was a relaxing experience and I will be back!
Lucy Trudeau
1683502223
I've been going here since it opened in the mall and I've been really pleased. Great shellac manicures, good eyebrow waxing, friendly staff and most importantly -- CLEAN.
Lindsay Grad
1672876330
I read the reviews and what could I lose try once and see. I came into a bright cheerful environment, welcomed by 2 lovely estheticians. I was met my esthetician with a smile, we walked to the room, where I was going to have my underarms waxed. I was so impressed with the fact the bed goes down, so it's easier to get on. I have Multiple Sclerosis so I struggle to get on to things, this was very helpful. The service took the exact time that was indicated. All in a I will be back to see Trishia she is a gem. Thank you.
Alanna Reider
1666485235
Visited to get an eyebrow wax done. Staff was friendly and attentive. Eyebrows looked good afterwards. Little pricey...
Sarah Morgan
1665689220
I thoroughly enjoyed my manicure by Janet! She was personable and listened to what I wanted and Janet gave me a perfect manicure.The facility is spotless and minimalistic in design which is refreshing.The owner was very friendly and accommodating.I will definitely be back and this will be my go-to for mani/pedis and laser treatment.
Jackie Psarianos
1663443700
Have been twice now for shellac manicure. Janet did a wonderful job. Loved the colours each time. No chipping. Janet is very friendly and good at what she does. Will be back for my next removal and polish. I also had a pedicure done by Treshia a couple of weeks ago. Loved the colour. My feet needed a lot of work. Calluses and hard nails. Treshia did a wonderful job. My feet were in much better shape when I left. Will be back for more.
Linda Strother
1659122269
Receptionist was friendly. Spa was clean. The girl who did my facial was kind, knowledgeable and made my overall experience pleasant and relaxing. Would recommend.
Monica Lam
1653706943
I love going to this location. Always very relaxing and has a great costumer service. Definitely recommend!
Tina Amouzgar
1652575715
I had an excellent experience at the Tenspot Hillcrest mall location. I have gotten waxing done (eyebrow and brazilian) by both Treshia and Delan, and mani pedi by Delan and my experience with all the services ive had, has been excellent. Both were extremely kind, welcoming, and truly care about their craft, their customer, putting in the time and attention to detail. I felt very cared for and left every time a very happy and satisfied customer and I highly recommend both for waxing/nails!
Nicole Vallysedigh
1651504035
Myself and my two daughters had the pleasure of using THE TEN SPOT Hillcrest Mall for our full body waxing needs. The waxing technicians were very thorough and professional and made sure we left looking and feeling like a 10! The establishment was extremely clean and sanitary and it was such a pleasure to be serviced there. Everyone was so kind and did everything they could to pay attention to our needs and to satisfy them to the best of their ability. One of my daughters has very sensitive skin and usually has adverse effects to waxing, so they took the extra time and effort to use methods that would reduce the redness and irritation she usually experiences when waxing. We will definitely return and will be trying other services like manicures, pedicures and laser. THE TEN SPOT Hillcrest Mall has easily become our new favourite full service beauty place in Richmond Hill.
Sonia Petrozza
1649863618
I had a shellac pedicure done by Delan. This was my first time getting a service done at The Ten Spot and I was thoroughly impressed. Cleanliness is key for me and The Ten Spot at Hillcrest has clearly demonstrated that by their sterile equipment. My feet also felt so soft! I highly recommend this location specifically and will be back for future services in order to feel like a TEN!Thank you!
Patricia Gatti
1649813631
Great service and great nail artists! Charm worked with me and she’s so incredibly kind and did an amazing job! Everyone here is professional, nice and do amazing work. Definitely recommend going here
Neeka Farahi
1647813119
I had the pleasure of being at their grand opening and Charm did my nails! I could confidently say that my nails have NEVER been taken care of to this degree! I felt like I was the only person in the room and not rushed like I do at other nail salons.I would definitely come back and recommend that all my friends come here too! Thanks for being the best at what you do Charm! See you next time.
Nacile Sharpe
1647130504
Went into the ten spot yesterday for a hard gel extension and lash lift and tint. I was made to feel welcome from start to finish. Janet did my services and I really appreciated her attention to detail.I had never done an eyelash lift & tint before. After the service, I was told to wait 24 hours to put on any mascara. The next day I had put on mascara, and all I can say is WOW. My eyelashes stood out so much I didn’t even have to put on eyeliner. My husband complimented me right away. Would definitely recommend this service.I was very impressed with the cleanliness of the space. I would definitely visit again😊
Silvana G
1646598951
‹
›
